content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was on patio in backyard.

2.  i was looking for the bright light my wife and i observed a few minutes earlier.

3. ufo

4.  object was heading southwest in direction of where the bright light was. 

5.  i felt as if i had just seen a ufo, did not even tell my wife until mon. after reading newspaper.

6.  object just went out of site.

as reported monday 23 september in the dallas mornin news on page 3.

texans saw fireball, scientfic society says.

the american meteor society says a bright light in the sky reported sat. night by hundreds of texans probably was a fireball , a term for a very bright meteor.

i saw the bright light and it was not a meteor, it did not move.
it was after the bright light that i saw the ufo.
content.summary: I saw ufo after seeing bright light in sky.

content.detailedDescription: Well i went out to enjoy the sunrise. it was around 7 am because the sun hadn't reached over the top of short mountain yet. at first when i saw the object i thought it was a jet that was far, far off with chemicals or smoke trailing behind it. but then as i watched it i realized that it looked rather odd. it wasn't acting like smoke. and it wasn't moving like a cloud either. the sky was totally clear so it couldn't have been a cloud. it was too small and didn't move like a lenticular cloud either. it looked as if it was shimmering. i don't know if it was because the sunlight was reflecting off of it or it was spinning and had flashing white lights on it. it started over to the right, above the mountain, and started moving left/north bound over the top of the mountain. i am not exactly sure how fast it was moving, but it took it about 7 to 8 minutes to move from there over to the tree line and out of my sight. in the video it's pretty hard to make out it's best viewed full screen and in high quality. i am sorry for the poor video, but it was a spur of the moment filming and my camera isn't the best and i have no tripod to sit it on. i see star-like ufo's rather often at night here since i live out in the country where it's easy to see the stars. but this is the first time i have ever seen anything like this. from what i can tell it was big.
content.summary: Observed object hovering and moving north over short mountain by my house.

content.detailedDescription: I just saw an unidentified flying object in the truest sense of the word. at appx. 720pm over the vegetable garden of the farm in canterbury, nh an object heading west began to glow bright blue-green while moving at the speed slightly slower then a descending meteor. it might have been a few thousand feet high, but was certainly not as high as when planes fly at higher altitudes of 20,000 - 30,000 feet. while i have int mind it was a metallic object crashing, there is one peculiarity. i spend a lot of time outside and see a lot of meteors. i have yet to see one which brightens, dims and brightens again during decsent. likewise i have never seen one glow blue-green during descent. within the appx. 3 seconds i saw this object it glowed blue-green then dimmed then brightened up again. it appeared to slow down each time while glowing which makes sense do to speed and atmospheric resistance. the trees west blocked the rest of the view but i could see through the lower portion and was looking for a crash because the object was quite large and fast. i dis not see the object go lower.
content.summary: At appx. 720pm over the vegetable garden of the farm in canterbury, nh an object heading west began to glow bright blue-green while moving at the speed slightly slower then a descending meteor.

content.detailedDescription:
My son was closing the bedroom window when they procure the object observed.
had many flashing lights, i could not see the contours. flew horizontally and then raised up out of sight.
content.summary: My son was closing the bedroom window when they procure the object observed.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a mysterious light over the sandia mountains on september 22, 2013. i observed this from rio rancho, nm. i first saw it at about 11 pm on the 21st, and thought it was just a bright star. but by 6 am i noticed it had become a lot brighter and could not be a star. it had not moved for over 6 hours. it was also witnessed by two other security officers. we used google sky to determine that the only thing close was mars, but it was way too bright to be mars. i had work to do and could not continue to observe it.
content.summary: A mysterious light over the sandia mountains on september 22, 2013.

content.detailedDescription: Back of my business and saw what appeared to be 2 suns and a smaller object also round and like the sun in color moving with the 2 suns as they rotate. if you enlarge the smaller object you can see it is either a very large ufo or an asteroid or planet !? also a lazer beam shot at my feet while taking these pics.
content.summary: Rotating with planet and sun

content.detailedDescription: I was driving this morning and saw a stationary object in the sky. where it was in the sky was very clear and blue. at first it appeared to be a solid and strangely shaped square, like a solid, white hole in the sky, but as i kept driving i noticed it was more of a diamond-shape and also appeared to have a vertical line going through the center of the shape. the shape  was very solid and defined. i kept watching it to see if it was perhaps a plane flying but it remained stationary in the sky. after watching it for a little over one minute, it disappeared, almost dissolving into itself. then after a few seconds it reappeared in a materializing way and was the exactly same size and shape as before it disappeared.  i kept watching it but i didn't see it disappear again trees began to block my view.
content.summary: Stationary, vanishing, reappearing, diamond-shaped split into two bright white vertical triangles.

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in the car on a dark back road with my boyfriend and we noticed a very bright light. we thought it might be a star at first but noticed it was way to low to be a star. so he stopped the car and we got out to get a better look. it was moving from side to side, back and forth, and changing shape at the same time. then it seemed to be moving toward where we were standing. my boyfriend is always looking at ufo videos and claiming to see them around here so he was in absolute awe. he just standing there and watched it. i've never seen anything like this in person so it really really scared me. i jumped into the car and told him i wanted to go. it was getting closer and closer and i just kept screaming "let's go! let's go! let's go!" i honestly was near tears because i was so scared. my boyfriend drove towards the city and we still saw it in the sky hovering. we lost sight of it because we stopped looking. there are too many trees where we live to be able to see it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Riding in car and saw a very bright light that looked like a star.

content.detailedDescription:
In mid october 2010 at zpprox 6pm i had just dropped off a customer and was on my way to pick up another in my taxi. i heard a very low rumble sound. i glance up to my 10'oclock through the window. i see part of a gray object moving very slowly . i think to myself "wow a harrier jet!" because of it's slow movement. the national guard air base is near by, so low flying planes are common so i put my thoughts back to driving. i continue to drive for a few more seconds and the woman in front of me pulls over to the right. i pulled over behind her so i could check the sight out(because by then i realized the plane must almost be stationary because we should have passed each other by now.) i exited my car and looked up. i couldnt comprehend what i was seeing. descrip-large 250-500 ft.-approx. 500 ft. in the air-moving approx. 5 mph s.E. direction -dark dull metallic gray hexagon-   poles on top of different lengths-no lights at all(think hexagon millenium falcon with poles on top) the bottom was un-uniform and blocky.  i was looking at it for about 5 seconds and then i looked over to the woman who had
parked and gotten out of her car also. we actually looked at each other with "what the hell?" faces at the same time. then i looked back up.(here's where it gets messed up) i continued to look at it for a couple more seconds. the next thing i remember is the woman and i getting back into our vehicles without talking to each other or glancing back up to see the craft. i just continued on my previous rout knowing what i had just seen but it wasn't a priority thought in my mind.(which is odd because i'm a very curious person by nature). i picked up a few more customers then went home. 
after the incident i had questions:
-i wondered where it came from? because something that large and low i should have seen coming for miles.
-how did the woman and i chose to get back in our cars at the same time?
-i take that it was gone when i was getting back in my car, but not sure.
-i had a cell phone camera too. but i guess taking a pic takes a backseat to awe. if i would have taken a pic no one would have believed it anyway.
content.summary: 250-500ft dark gray hexagon- lumpy like millenium falcon-large poles on top

content.detailedDescription:
I was trying to sleep.
i looked out the window.
i did nit look like a aircraft because it rolled.
bright flashing green,blue and red lights.
kind of and scared. 
it flew behind a tree.
content.summary: I

content.detailedDescription: I've seen this orange ball almost every night sitting on my front porch. but tonight i knot iced it come from the south. then it disappeared under the tree line. about an hour later i was talking to my father and i seen it moving about a half a mile away. and it was glowing bright orange. and looked like a street light. i told my dad if call him back to try and get a picture. when i hung up the outer orange light goes off and a cabin light comes on. it flew strait east, toward my house. i had my phone out trying to get a video of this. but my iphone camera isn't very strong. as it got closer and was about 80% up from me and getting closer i ran inside. nothing is on the video
content.summary: Hovering orange light turns off. then cabin light comes on

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving for work this morning at 6:25. my wife walked with me to our back door to help catch any of our six kittens that try to get in the house every morning. i had my face towards the back door talking to my wife. i was on the third step and she leaned down to pick up one of our kittens. i asked her did she see hercules, as i turned around to look towards my car to hunt the cat, i noticed a bright green glow. i saw a solid, perfectly round orb shooting across the sky. the orbs light lite up the shy and highlighted the cloud around it. i know it was under the clouds because it outlined the clouds with it's light. there was no sound and i had a clear view of the object. from my viewpoint it was about the size of a baseball. it moved for about 6 seconds and completely disappeared. i was stunned and when i turned to my wife, she said that she only saw a flash kind of like a falling star. she was petting our cat and i was in front of her, so she did not see the object like i did. i was excited and freaking out a little because i believe in ufo's but have never seen anything remotely close to a ufo. i do not know what this was, but it was not flickering like a burning object falling to the earth. it was a solid green orb. it's shape remained the same size and it's glow was consistent. it just disappeared and was gone.
content.summary: My wife was talking to me as i was leaving for work. when i asked where our kitten was as i turned around i saw a solid green orb

content.detailedDescription: On september 22, 2013 i was standing outside with my brother and mom having a casual cinversation when my mom noticed something coming out of the trees.  we thought it was a flare at first, but it kept traveling.  two more of these floating orange orbs came out behind the first orb.  we were all in awe over what we had just seen and knew it was a once in a lifetime oppurtunity to see it.  they slowly flickered, looking like they were going behind a cloud, but there were no clouds in the sky, finally disappearing.  we carried on with the previous conversation.  then, i see something out of the corner of my eye, and it is two more floating orbs the same exact color! they all went in the same line over mine and my neighbors house. slowly they started looking like they were going behind clouds, but there were no clouds in the sky.  finally they all disappeared.  we waited for another twenty minutes outside, but never saw another one. it was crazy what we all saw, knowing that we never may see it again.
content.summary: Bright orange light flying in straight path over my neighborhood

content.detailedDescription: I am the witness's father, until i viewed the pictures ,videos and e-mails i had my doubts but no longer. this is real ! the witness has several sightings and encounters but could not get anyone to listen to him. tonight as seen in the pictures and videos clearly shows concrete evidence of the events. him and girlfriend can hold out they're hands and a white, small dome shape objects lands in they're hands, not harming them but rather studying them. this is truely something that warrants an investigator to come to there home at night and witness for themselves. this would not be a waste of time. this has been going on along time with encounters but no one would take the time or effort to investigate it. these sightings are a nightly event. please feel to call me or e-mail at any time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Appears everynight for past three weeks at dark until morning

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my room when i looked out the window (window faces east) when i noticed a bright red-ish light moving pretty fast (speed of a helcopter is closest i can describe it as). i ran outside and watch it pass behind trees that were blocking it from my view. it was coming from the east and moving west. it was hard to see distinguish distance but it was too bright and big to be a airplane. it was as bright as a plane with its lending lights on heading straight at me but it moving across the sky not facing me. when it cleared one more tree it stopped moving, hovered and after a minute it disappeared. it shrank until the light extinguished. it probably took like 3 secs to vanish.

i didn't feel any fear the entire event. before i ran outside i almost forgot to take my camera. i grabbed my iphone but during the event all i could think about was about my dslr camera in the house. i wanted to get that but while i was filming with my iphone i didn't want to turn away i'm case i missed something. i also kind of figured that if i couldn't make out any details with my eyes then my camera wouldn't do much better.

when i started filing it, it seemed to know what i was doing and stopped moving.  that's when i thought to myself "holly crap, what if it comes my direction!" i stopped filming and a few seconds later it disappeared.


as i submit the video i saw i took two pics. i don't remember taking pics during the event.
content.summary: Bright fire ball coming from ne heading w, stopped, hovered, filmed it hovering, then disappeared (shrank until disappeared)

content.detailedDescription: While out walking our dogs, my wife first noticed several transparent clouds forming a ray like pattern parallel to one another about 25 degrees in the eastern sky. in the middle was what we thought to be venus, but realized venus was setting in the west. the object was bright, round, extremely distant, and stationary. the event lasted about 10 minutes. unfortunately, we did not observed its disappearance.
content.summary: Observed a star like object at dusk in eastern sky

content.detailedDescription:
It came from above the clouds that were broken straight down stopped and then moved to the north east.
it was partly cloudy and it stopped about 6,000 feet. it looked small at that altitude. if was at about 5 miles ne of my location.
content.summary: It was definately a disc shape.

content.detailedDescription:
On my way to work i witnessed two low flying, triangular shaped craft moving in complete silence along baltimore washington parkway

i deliver the washington post newspaper every morning. on monday, 09/02/2013 between 2:30 and 2:45 am as i took an exit off greenbelt, rd to merge onto baltimore washington parkway traveling south towards washington dc., i noticed two cars pulled on the shoulder with their hazard lights on. then as soon as i fully merged onto the parkway, myself and passengers in five or so other vehicles witnessed two very low flying, triangular shaped craft move somewhat slowly along the parkway and in complete silence. both craft looked exactly alike, triangular in shape with three white lights, one on each angle, one red light in the middle and two small green lights towards the back. the craft was coming toward me as i traveled south on baltimore washington parkway, then turned right running parallel to interstate 495. it was foggy that night and we eventually lost sight of the two craft. i was only able to see the two green lights once they turned revealing the back, underside of the craft.

right before the event, i noticed many police vehicles on greenbelt road with cars pulled over as well as two cars pulled on the shoulder of baltimore washington parkway with their hazard lights on apparently also witnessing the two craft. i have never seen anything like what i saw that night and will never forget it.

i am 100% positive whatever i saw was not constructed by man. i found this sight trying to see if anyone else posted anything from that night as i am sure other people witnessed the aircraft as well.
content.summary: I witnessed two low flying, triangular shaped craft moving in complete silence along baltimore washington parkway. there were also cars on the side of the road with hazards on apparently also witnessing the event

content.detailedDescription: 1.Was at residence walking back from dumpster.2.Yellow object in clear night sky.3.Trianglar yellow object traveling across sky in level soundless flight.4.Trianglar yellow object with three small orbs attached via tublinks emmitting yellow steady light travelling from sw to ne direction apprx 500 ft agl. steady level soundless flight.5.Was attempting to identify object and keep it in view as long as possible.After sighting,called marquette city police dept and reported it..Event#1309060055.6.Object continued on steady ne path until out of sight.
content.summary: Observed triangler yellow object in level flight

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving seabrook and heading home through kensington. driving alone in my car. i turned onto route 150 in kensington by the intersection, there was a car behind me. and at one point while driving i see a bright light (blue/blue-green) pass above the trees from the right side to the left side of the road. i noticed it because the sky was dark. i immediately noticed it had a disc shape, and was like a blue flame that turned different shades of bright blue. it lasted about 4-5 seconds. as soon as i saw the object i paid close attention to see what it was doing. at about 5 seconds it disappeared into nothing. it was moving very fast like a shooting star, but it was lower than a plane would be. i was struck that it was an actual object shaped like a blue disc (like a flame that flickered) and moving very fast. my first thought on seeing it was "the shape looks like a persons lips". what i mean by lips is skinny on the ends and thick in the middle. the disc shape is a better way of describing it. i thought about pulling onto a side road to see if i could see it again in some big open field. i felt excited driving home. i was trying to think about what i had seen. i searched on twitter to see if anyone saw it too. there was a car behind me that may or may not have seen it. we were both in line of the object in the sky at the same time.

i thought about telling people about it, and they would say, "it was fireworks." i can guarantee. but this was flying horizontal and a big solid shape, brightly lit with almost neon blue.
content.summary: Driving in my car, see a bright blue/teal disc object fly over the road

content.detailedDescription: There was a bright flash of white light.  then another flash a bit lower in a straight line then another but further down not in a rythmic flashing, it was random as far as distance but in a straight down pattern.  then it moved upward in straight line one final flash and was gone.
content.summary: bright flash of white light, descending,not in a rhythmic flashing then ascending

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the balcony smoking a cigarette and noticed something out of the corner of my eye. one red-orange light moving across the sky, it was very bright and may have passed directly over dodger stadium. it went behind the roof and i lost track of it. it looked like nothing i had ever seen before. too bright and not the right color to be a plane, and no noise whatsoever. my first thought was possibly a shooting star. however, it was flying horizontally and did not ���burn out��� or leave a trail. 

seconds later 2 more red-orange lights ���appeared���  to the right of the first light, approx. 3-5 miles away from the first sighting. they were headed towards me. there was no sound and the lights did not flash. i listened for jet engines, propellers or helicopter noise and there was none. based on their appeared proximity to me i should have heard something but they were silent. they were not the same color as any airplane or helicopter lights i had ever seen. 

they appeared to be flying horizontally but not in a perfect flight pattern. the light on the left started to ascend upwards until it simply disappeared. after it disappeared the light on the right also ascended upwards until it too simply disappeared. i watched the lights shrink until they were the same size as the stars next to them and just kept going. the speed of the ascension was swift, much more so than any helicopter is capable of doing. it took about 3 or 4 seconds for it to travel from a very large brilliant light within approx. 7,000 feet distance from me and an approx. altitude of the same until it was a mere ���speck���, incredibly high in the sky. 

this all happened just before midnight, approx. 11:45-11:50 pm september 21, 2013 over a very populated area of los angeles. the total time of the sighting from start to finish was about 1 minute, maybe a minute and a half. ��� silent, quick and remarkably extraordinary. 

while it was happening i just stood there in silence watching everything i could notice. i was in disbelief of what i was possibly witnessing. after it was over i thought to myself ���wow, that was really cool��� and was pretty excited, in a good way. not once did i ever feel fear or panic or threatened in anyway during the event.
content.summary: 3 red-orange lights near downtown la ascended into sky and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 1900 on 21 sept 2013 i witnessed a very bright object in the sky and observed the object for 15 min, while on the university of new mexico campus in albuquerque, nm. i was at the student union (sub) earlier and then i had an urge to go outside and look towards the east (sandia mountains). it was approximately 1900 and the sun was setting. the sky conditions were clear with no cloud cover in any direction northeast to southeast. there was a flock of common house finches in the tree with a flurry of chirping at this time. i had an urge to look towards the east and saw an extremely noticeable bright object in the sky. the object was approximately 13-15 degrees in the sky and was bright white. it was also in the form of a cylinder about so, i first though it was comet ison. of course that was ruled out as it is scheduled to pass in nov, and then i ruled out aircraft types, and balloons. the object remained in the same spot on the sky for the entire duration of 15 min. the object was as bright as a sewing pin head held at arm���s length for the duration. it seemed to be above the traffic departure pattern at the airport, estimated at 15000���. aircraft traffic taking off towards the east did not seem to be near it vertically or horizontally; however, i can bet radar would have picked the object up. the object also seemed to be friendly and there were times during the duration i saw other smaller white objects around it for less than a second. when i asked if they could change colour they did at the time period of 12-15 min. the object became more circular and changed from bright white to red orange to red then faded out to look like a very dim white star. i did not observe the object after 15 min. i normally do not make reports unless the object is a bit more significant in scale/size/colour/duration; although i see objects usually once a week or more. i also have an extensive military aircraft background and have seen objects of significance while on missions. lastly, i want to give my sincere thanks to you for providing this service and thankful you are also featured on coast to coast often!
content.summary: Bright ufo object by sandia mountains, albuquerque, nm

content.detailedDescription: I work at 911 callcenter and we received numorous calls from citizens claiming to have witnessed orange sphere lights in the sky.
content.summary: Orange glowing orbs

content.detailedDescription:
In the foothill south of nampa i was taking pictures of my grandson for school  did not see the object at first until i looked at them on my computer 
had know idea what they were  5 objects just flying away from my area since i did not see them at first i had no reactions again did not see them at first i was looking at my grandson
content.summary: Don;t have any idea what they were

content.detailedDescription: Family members and i were coming home from a trip to the red river gorge in two separate vehicles, traveling north on us highway 27 in northern ky. passing out of falmouth ky around 9pm, we saw a bright yellowish-orange light ascending out of the tree line to the north east.  as we watched, trying to understand what we were seeing, more lights followed the first, forming a delta triangular formation. this formation ascended until it was overhead traveling in an ascending southeast direction.  at this point, we all felt this was an unusual event, and possible extraterrestrial in nature. the driver of the vehicle that i was in, pulled over to the side of the road, so that we could get a better view and take pictures/video.  (we had cameras handy because of our daytrip to natural bridge ky, and the kids taking pictures of things along the road trip home.)  the car following us pulled over behind us, and we all got out to view the event.  as we watched, more lights trailed the first group, following a roughly straight-line path to the southeast.  during this first event, we saw a series of approximately 13 lights in all.  the lights were a steady bright yellow-orange, moved steadily but slowly across the sky, almost hovering at times, and followed a clear arc across the sky passing directly overhead, and then moving past us until they began to disappear fading out in the far southeastern sky.  there were 6 adults, 3 teens and two kids with us, and we all had varying reactions to the events.  i was excited and exhilarated.  some of us were scared and disturbed.  others were dumbstruck and confused, trying to come up with a rational explanation for the strange series of lights. i felt consistently that we were viewing ufo's and possibly extraterrestrial spacecraft. other explanations which were thrown out were: chinese lanterns/flares/missiles/and unknown military aircraft.  the lights moved too controlled and deliberately across the sky, rising steadily and moving at a relatively constant pace to be anything random or unmanned/controlled.  as we watched, the first lights began to break formation and one light sped up and jumped ahead until fading out of sight.  all the lights moved to the same area of the sky before likewise fading out.  having watched the lights for roughly 12 minutes, we began to become concerned, and even scared.  if this was not a series of extraterrestrial spacecraft, then we might be watching missile launchings and could be about to experience a nuclear war and worse.  we wanted to get home and see if there was any related news reports or other possible explanations.  as we left the area, the lights continued to rise and fill the sky.  on the way home, other lights came up in a more horizontal string and then the sightings stopped.  overall, we figure there had been anywhere between 18 and 24 lights all following the same basic slow steady path across the sky. there were no news reports and no other related information corroborated our experience. during the event there was no accompanying sounds, the lights traveling through the sky in absolute silence. it was hard to determine any size or distance, as the objects may have been external lights attached to a larger object that we couldn't actually see, or the lights were themselves the objects and much higher in the sky.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Series of lights rising over tree tops passing overhead across highway then fading out

content.detailedDescription: Was just sitting here reading a book, in my chair next to my upstairs room window. i casually looked out at the night and the sky and see to the west of platteville wi an unknown far object flashing bright electric-like lights. that was 3:12am central time. pink and green, but they look electric, it looks like the colors swirl around the whole object and it's still there right now to the west of platteville wi. it has moved higher and lower and now is up even higher straight up, its blinking and pulsating really fast now, it's amazing how fast and bright this is!!!! it'd now 3:43 and the craft like light is still there. in the western sky of platteville wi.
content.summary: Was just sitting here reading a book, in my chair next to my upstairs room window. i casually looked out at the night and the sky and see to the west of platteville wi an unknown far object flashing bright electric-like lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was preparing to unload equipment for work and i looked up at the sky as i often do. i saw a light that seemed too diffuse to be an airplane. it appeared to be traveling west and was far north of my position and had a regular pattern of dimming and britening with a period of 15 seconds or so. having eliminated airplanes and stars i thought it might be a satalite. a cloud obscured my view for a moment. when it came back in to view it had deviated from its prior course in an unexpected manor. i noted that it was very fuzzy but appeared spherical. then the object took off to the north at an apparent speed about 10 times faster than jets just under mach1 at an airshow and yet i heard nothing. it could have been approaching the oregon border in less than 5 seconds when i lost sight of it due to the great distance. it's trajectory looked like it curved down leading me to believe it maintained its altitude. i starred at the sky for a few minutes after and saw nothing. i was happy and a bit excited as i've never witnessed any ufo phenomena before, yet i regularly observe the night sky for pleasure.
content.summary: Orb moving "slowly" then accelerated north at incredible speed

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in the porch of my house then i heard humming buzzing and beeping then it flew across me it went to a nearby field then it landed and an alien came out of the saucer and looked around as it went in i ran back in the house i was able to take a picture of that ufo when it was flying
content.summary: Not very big and and very slow
